import React, { useState } from 'react'; import damasImage from '../imagenes/wallpaperbetter.jpg'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function RegistrarUsuario() { const [usuario, setUsuario] = useState({ nombre:"", email:"", password: "" }) const{nombre, email, password} = usuario const onInputChange = (e) => { setUsuario({...usuario, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } const onSubmit = async (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); } const containerStyle = { backgroundImage: `url(${damasImage})`, margin: '0px', padding: '0px', backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center', minHeight: '100vh', maxWidth: "100%", display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', color: '#000000' }; return (
{/* Utilizamos vh-100 para ocupar toda la altura de la ventana */}
